---
title: "Data from Rocky Intertidal Zones"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Biodiversity survey data are currently being collected and uploaded to [OBIS](https://obis.org/) by MBON Pole to Pole members. 

You can access available datasets for the following locations:

- [Montemar - Chile](https://obis.org/dataset/5e009291-b1ce-454f-bbcf-d98142eaeda9)
- [Gorgona Island - Colombia](https://obis.org/dataset/871e92ab-2a00-4851-b948-cb6dda862f9c)
- [Puerto Madryn - Argentina](https://obis.org/dataset/1d8fb994-64af-4a57-abe2-19573cc91f85)
- [Concepcion - Chile](https://obis.org/dataset/e4a2fe06-f082-4f36-9165-73263a121508)
- [Arraial do Cabo - Brazil](https://obis.org/dataset/7ece3f71-6bae-4cc4-8619-d560a564f187)
- [Costa das Algas - Brazil](https://obis.org/dataset/29059698-61ea-4882-9e1f-fca042056ddf)

More data will become available soon!
